summary_points: 1. News Corp repurchased approximately US$648,722,800.46 worth of Class A and Class B shares as of March 14, 2025, under a US$1 billion stock repurchase program.
2.  As of March 14, 2025, 21,241,388 Class A shares and 10,481,096 Class B shares were repurchased under the program.
3. News Corp's stock repurchase program continues, with the potential to repurchase up to an additional US$351,277,199.54 (US$1 Billion - US$648,722,800.46) in Class A and Class B common stock.
